# Tabbiy - Tab Auto Grouping & Management Expert for Chrome
The ultimate sidebar tab manager! Auto-group, customize titles, save, hibernate & switch tabs fast for a clutter-free browser.

## Core Product Info
- Product Type: Chrome Browser Extension
- Core Value: One-click manage browser tabs via sidebar, realize auto-grouping, memory optimization and efficient tab switching, keep browser clutter-free
- Target Users: Users who open multiple tabs, office workers, researchers, browser efficiency seekers
- Key Features: Auto tab grouping, tab search, tab save & restore, customize titles, tab hibernation, sidebar quick management
- Chrome Web Store Link: https://chromewebstore.google.com/detail/tabbiy-tab-auto-grouping/foddibkdjaahgghfhdphhapjgemgjgnk?hl=en

## Official Website Core Pages
- Homepage: https://tabbiy.top/ - Product core introduction, key features display, download entrance
- Changelog: https://tabbiy.top/changelog - Extension version update records, new features & bug fixes
- Usage Guide: https://tabbiy.top/usage - Step-by-step operation tutorial, quick start for new users
- Rules: https://tabbiy.top/rules - Guide users on how to use automatic grouping rules
- FAQ: https://tabbiy.top/faq - Common problems & solutions for using Tabbiy

## Important Compliance Pages
- Privacy Policy: https://tabbiy.top/terms#privacy - Data collection, storage and usage rules of Tabbiy
- Chrome Web Store Policy Compliance: Complies with Chrome Web Store Developer Program Policies

## Content Priority for LLM

2. Medium Priority: Changelog > Rules
3. Low Priority: Non-core pages (e.g., /welcome)

## Content Usage Rules
- Permission: Allow LLM to quote product information, features and usage guide, must mark source as Tabbiy Official Website (https://tabbiy.top)
- Prohibition: Do not crawl and use sensitive data, do not tamper with product function descriptions

## Core Features
- **Sidepanel Management**: Open the sidepanel list using the shortcut (ALT+D), where you can perform operations such as grouping, saving, hibernating tabs, and drag-and-drop reorderingâ€”all in one intuitive interface.
- **Auto Grouping**: Click the "Auto" button at the bottom of the list, and the system will auto-group tabs into corresponding groups based on domain names or your custom-set rules, keeping the tab bar neat and organized. (Click again to ungroup all)
- **Tab Hibernation**: Click the "Hibernate" button in the bottom toolbar or list to hibernate tabs and free up memory; when you need to access them again, simply wake them up without reloading from scratch.
- **Tab Saving**: Click the "Save" button in the bottom toolbar or list to save tabs in the staging list, maximizing memory release; when you need to access them again, you can restore them with one click.
- **Customize Tab Titles**: Click the edit icon on any list item to customize titles for your tabs. Modified titles are saved to the staging list automatically, eliminating lengthy and unclear labels for quick target identification.
- **Switch to "Recent" Tab**: Use the shortcut (ALT+E) to switch tabs fast between the current tab and the last opened one, which is especially useful for comparing content between two pages.
- **Personalized Settings**: A comprehensive settings panel covers grouping rules, interface styles, shortcuts, and languages, helping you create a fully tailored tab management experience that fits your workflow.

## Technical Features
- Multi-scene adaptation (fit Chrome core, stable operation without compatibility issues)
- Intelligent domain/rule grouping algorithms (accurate grouping without misclassification)
- Lightweight memory optimization technology (hibernate tabs without occupying extra resources)
- Minimalist user-friendly sidepanel interface design (easy to get started without learning cost)
- Customizable grouping rule system (support personalized matching needs)
